messages.subject: Worst case scenario
messages.msgSnippet: When it s too late, it s too late. Do it now. Do it soon. And add to it as they grow. This is really good advice. I don t have a video camera...sadly, mine
messages.messageBody:
"When it's too late, it's too late. Do it now. Do it soon. And add to
it as they
grow."

This is really good advice.
I don't have a video camera...sadly, mine was destroyed in an
accident, but I DO write about our lives.
Journals or blogs are another way to capture moments and memories for
your children. I really, really wish my Mum had kept more personal
writing..she only wrote for classes most of the time. Sad.

I have SO many questions for her now, and it's too late. You always
think you're going to get a bit more time.

On a positive note, she had an active, interesting life while living
with breast cancer for 12 years. I really believe there are a lot of
great alternative therapies now, and combined with modern medicine,
there is MUCH hope for cancer patients.

I'll be thinking about you Holly.

Ren
